name: Hacked! 2
description:
The sequel to the game Hacked!  In this version, there is better, more accurate commands that a hacker would enter.  There still isn't a lot of commands but I will add more very soon.

Commands:

ip_config

connect(ip_address)

sql_inject(http://fakewebsite.com/)

server(ip_address)

bank_account(Username && Password)

email_account(Username && Password)

hide(User.ip_address)

Please note you have to get the ip address and connect to the computer before running one of the commands.  You also have to run the hide() command.
